menu.title: Espoon varhaiskasvatuksen palvelu
menu.description: By signing in you may create a new application or view your previous applications and received decisions

map-view.search-text: In this view, you can search for suitable locations in the given period.
map-view.info-title: Service map of early childhood education of the city of Espoo
map-view.info-description:
Welcome to use the Service map of Early Childhood Education of the City of Espoo. Using the map does not require identification. You will be requested to identificate yourself when you are about to apply to early childhood education.

In the service map, you can see location of our service points. On the map, you can open an info box of each service point for further information. In the info box, there is a link for additional information of given service point.

map-filters.address-placeholder: Choose address, from which the distance is calculated
map-filters.address-not-found: Could not find addresses with the given search criteria
map-filters.apply-term-info-map: Clubs starting in fall 2019 official application period is 1.–31.3.2019. Applications sent after this will be processed in the arrival order. Application period for term starting in fall 2019 will continue until the end of April 2020. If your child will receive a place in a club, you will receive a decision for it during April-May. Decision is made for one year at a time. Club operational year starts in August and lasts until the end of May. Club applications are valid until the end of given operational year. If you want to apply for the following operational year, please create a new application.
map-filters.apply-term-info: Clubs follow preschool work and vacation times
map-filters.no-apply-terms: No club terms to be selected.

application-list.title: Applying for early childhood education or a club and enrolling for pre-primary education
application-list.data-source-info: A child’s guardian can submit an application for early childhood education or a club and enrol the child to pre-primary education. Information on the guardian’s children is automatically retrieved from the Digital and Population Data Services Agency  and displayed in this view.
application-list.confirm-remove-application: Do you want to remove the application?

confirm-modal.remove-title: Do you want to remove the application?
confirm-modal.remove-text: All the information of the application will be lost. Also, if the application has already been sent, it will be cancelled.

application-list.waiting-confirmation: In the Decisions page you can read the decision and either accept or reject the proposed place.
application-list.status-info-sent: If you wish to cancel a submitted application, please contact the Early Childhood Education Service Guidance via E-mail.

decision-list.title: Decisions that wait for your confirmation

decision-list-item.title: Decision
decision-list-item.open-info: Please open the decision and respond whether you will accept or reject the place
decision-list-item.status-pending: Waiting for confirmation from the guardian

decision-type.connecting-daycare: @:decision-list-item.decision-type.decision of early childhood education related to pre-primary education

decision-view.download: Click to download the decision document
decision-view.title_club: Accepting of rejecting the place in a club
decision-view.title_daycare: Accepting or rejecting a place in the early childhood education
decision-view.title_preschool: Accepting of rejecting a place in the pre-primary education
decision-view.title_connecting_daycare: Accepting or rejecting a place in early childhood education related to pre-primary education
decision-view.title_preparatory: Accepting or rejecting a place in preparatory education
decision-view.decision-blocked: You can accept this place afer you have first accepted the related pre-primary education place.
decision-view.text_club: You must either accept or reject the place proposed in the decision within two weeks of receiving this notification.
decision-view.text_daycare: You must either accept or reject the place proposed in the decision within two weeks of receiving this notification.
decision-view.text_preschool: You must either accept or reject the place proposed in the decision within two weeks of receiving this notification.
decision-view.text_preschool_general: You must either accept or reject the place proposed in the decision of pre-primary education, preparatory education and/or early childhood education related to pre-primary education within two weeks of receiving this notification. If you have applied for several services, you will receive separate decisions for each of them that require your action.

form.willAccept: We will accept the place starting
form.willReject: We will not accept the place.
form.startDate-instructions: Pre-primary education and preparatory education for children follow mostly school work and vacation schedules. Start date will only be altered if there is a strong legitimate reason for this.
form.startDateMove: Aloitusaikaa voidaan siirtää max. 2 viikkoa eteenpäin.

modal.acceptTitleText: You are about to accept the proposed place.
modal.acceptSuccessfulMessageText: Saat vielä sähköpostiisi vahvistuksen paikan vastaanottamisesta
modal.acceptErrorMessageText: Hyväksyttäessä tapahtui virhe. Yritä uudelleen hetken kuluttua.
modal.rejectTitleText: You are about to reject the proposed place.
modal.rejectSuccessfulTitleText: You have rejected the proposed place
modal.rejectSuccessfulMessageText: Your application has been invalidated. If you wish to apply new place, please create new application
modal.rejectErrorMessageText: Hakemusta hylättäessä tapahtui virhe. Yritä uudelleen hetken kuluttua.

form.heading: Lomake varhaiskasvatukseen hakemiseen.
form.guidelines: Vestibulum ultrices euismod pellentesque. Donec placerat suscipit finibus. Cras congue ut velit in ornare. Nulla non condimentum tortor. Praesent sit amet vestibulum velit. Proin tincidunt aliquam tortor, rutrum posuere justo posuere sit amet. Ut pretium est ac lectus placerat porta.
form.club-guidelines: Syksyllä käynnistyviin kerhoihin hakuaika on maaliskuussa. Jos lapsenne saa kerhopaikan, saatte päätöksen siitä huhti-toukokuun aikana. Päätös tehdään yhden toimintakauden ajaksi (elokuusta toukokuun loppuun). Päätös kerhopaikasta tulee suomi.fi palveluun tai postitse, mikäli ette ole ottanut palvelua käyttöön. Kerhohakemuksen voi jättää, vaikka kerhojen toimintakausi olisi jo alkanut. Kerhohakemukset ovat voimassa kyseisen toimintakauden loppuun asti. Kerhotoiminta on maksutonta ja siihen osallistuminen ei vaikuta Kelan maksamaan kotihoidontukeen. Jos lapselle on myönnetty yksityisen hoidon tuki, ei lapselle voida myöntää kerhopaikkaa.
form.over-age: Lapsi on liian vanha hakeakseen varhaiskasvtuksen palveluita

application-type.title: Application type
application-type.club-over-age: Lapsi on liian vanha varhaiskasvatuksen kerhohoitoon.
application-type.application-info:
Kunnallisen varhaiskasvatuksen sähköisellä hakemuksella haetaan kunnallisiin päiväkoteihin, perhepäivähoitoon, ryhmäperhepäiväkoteihin sekä kerhoihin. Hakemus on jätettävä viimeistään neljä kuukautta ennen toivottua hoidon alkamispäivää. Kiireellisissä tarpeissa, joita ei ole pystytty ennakoimaan, on varhaiskasvatuspaikkaa haettava niin pian kuin mahdollista, kuitenkin viimeistään kaksi viikkoa ennen kuin tarve alkaa.

Kerhot tarjoavat vaihtoehdon koko- tai osapäiväiselle varhaiskasvatukselle. Kotihoidossa olevalla 2-5 -vuotiaalla lapsella on kerhossa mahdollisuus osallistua ohjattuun toimintaan lapsiryhmässä. Kerhossa ollaan joko 2 tai 3 tuntia päivässä ilman vanhempia 2-3 päivänä viikossa kerhon toimintapäivistä riippuen. Kerhotoimintaan osallistuminen ei vaikuta Kelan maksamaan kotihoidontukeen. heelle maksetaan yksityisen hoidon tukea, ei lapselle voida myöntää kerhopaikkaa.

Kerhon toimintakausi on elokuusta toukokuun loppuun. Kerhohakemuksen voi jättää, vaikka kerhojen toimintakausi olisi jo alkanut. Kerhohakemukset ovat voimassa kyseisen toimintakauden loppuun asti. Kerhomaksu vaihtelee viikoittaisten kerhopäivien ja kerhon päivittäisen toiminta-ajan mukaisesti. Lisätietoa maksuista www.espoo.fi.
application-type.with-daycare-info:
Esiopetusta tarjotaan sekä päiväkodeissa että kouluissa 4 tuntia päivässä kello 8-13 välisenä aikana.

Esiopetuspäiväkodeissa ja -kouluissa tarjotaan päivähoitoa aamulla ennen esiopetuksen alkua ja iltapäivisin esiopetuksen jälkeen. Päivähoito on maksullista.

Esiopetukseen liittyvää päivähoitoa voi hakea siten, että hoito alkaa ennen esiopetuksen alkamista, aikaisintaan 1.8.2017. Kouluilla järjestettävää esiopetuksen liittyvää päivähoitoa voi kuitenkin hakea vasta esiopetuksen alkamispäivästä alkaen. Tällöin lapsi voi jatkaa esiopetuksen alkuun saakka vanhassa päivähoitopaikassa.

select-application-type.title: Selection of application type
select-application-type.subtitle: Select the application type and go to the application.
info: You can make changes to your application until its processing starts. After this, you can make changes to your application by contacting early childhood education service counselling (tel. 09 816 31000). If you wish to cancel an application you have submitted, please send an email to early childhood education service counselling (varhaiskasvatuksen.palveluohjaus@espoo.fi).

daycare.label: Application for early childhood education
daycare.instruction: The application for early childhood education is used to apply for a municipal early childhood education place at a day-care centre, family day-care provider and group family day-care provider.
daycare.disabled: Esiopetukseen voi ilmoittautua {range} välisenä aikana. Varsinainen ilmoittautumisaika esiopetukseen on {date}.

preschool.label: Enrolment to pre-primary education and/or preparatory education.
preschool.description: Application for connected early childhood education for a child who will be / has been enrolled in pre-primary education or preparatory education.
preschool.instruction: Free-of-charge pre-primary education is available for four hours per day. In addition, you can apply for connected early childhood education (subject to a fee) for your child. It is available in pre-primary education units in the morning before pre-primary education and in the afternoon after pre-primary education. You can submit an application for connected early childhood education at the same time as you enrol your child in pre-primary education or through a separate application after pre-primary education has started. You can also use the same application to apply for free-of-charge preparatory education and early childhood education connected to preparatory education.
preschool.disabled: Valmistavaan opetukseen voi ilmoittautua {range} välisenä aikana.

club.label: Club application
club.instruction: The club application is used for applying for municipal clubs.

select-application-type.duplicate-warning: The child already has a similar unfinished application. Please return to the Applications view and complete the existing application or contact the Early Childhood Education Service Guidance.

matching-placement.daycare-transfer: Your child already has a place in the City of Espoo’s early childhood education. Use this application to apply for a transfer to another early childhood education unit.
matching-placement.preschool-transfer-only: Your child already has a place in pre-primary education and connected early childhood education. Use this application to apply for a transfer to another pre-primary education unit.
matching-placement.preschool-transfer-and-daycare: Your child already has a place in pre-primary education. Use this application to apply for early childhood education connected to pre-primary education or a transfer to another pre-primary education unit.

error.title: Oops…
error.text: There are some invalid or incomplete fields in the form. Please check the form.

form.validation-instruction: Please check following fields on the form

apply.title: Application preference
apply.general-info: You can apply for 1 to 3 locations in your order of preference. Application preferences do not guarantee a place at the desired location, but the possibility of obtaining a desired location increases by giving more than one option.
apply.location-and-group-description: Listalla näkyvät valitsemanasi toimintakautena valittavissa olevat toimipaikat ja sen kerhoryhmät.
apply.sibling-basis-check: Haen ensisijaisesti paikkaa samasta kerhoryhmästä, jossa lapsen sisarus on.
apply.sibling-basis-info:
Sisarukseksi katsotaan kaikki samassa osoitteessa asuvat lapset. Tavoitteena on sijoittaa sisarukset samaan kerhoryhmään perheen niin toivoessa.

Täytä nämä tiedot vain jos käytät sisarusperustetta.
apply.select-club-and-group: Valitse toimipaikka ja ryhmä. Voit käyttää nuolinäppäimiä ja enteriä.
apply.select-location-info: Valitse vähintään 1 ja enintään 3 toimipistettä ja järjestä ne toivejärjestykseen.
apply.select-club-location-info: Valitse vähintään {minSelections} ja enintään {maxSelections} ryhmää ja järjestä ne toivejärjestykseen.
apply.change-order-drag: You may change the order by dragging.
apply.select-location-max-selected: Maximum number of preferred units reached. Remove an unit so you can add a new one

daycare-application.title: Application for early childhood education
text: You can apply for early childhood education all year round. The application must be submitted at the latest four months before the need for early childhood education begins. If you urgently need early childhood education, you must apply for a place at the latest two weeks before the need begins. The applicant will receive a written decision on the early childhood education place via the Messages service of Suomi.fi or by post if the applicant has not taken in use the Messages service of Suomi.fi.
If your child has a guarantee of an early childhood education place, please inform about it in the additional information field of the application

requestAnotherUnit.label: Lapseni on jo varhaiskasvatuksessa ja haluan tehdä siirtohakemuksen toiseen toimipisteeseen.

instructions.text: Kun lapsella on jo paikka Espoon kunnallisessa varhaiskasvatuksessa ja lapselle halutaan hakea varhaiskasvatuspaikkaa toisesta toimipisteestä, tehdään siirtohakemus. Siirtohakemus on voimassa vuoden hakemuksen jättöpäivämäärästä. Sillä ei ole käsittelyaikaa vaan siirtopäätöksiä tehdään hakija- ja paikkatilanteen sen mahdollistaessa. Voit halutessasi antaa siirtoa koskien tietoa lisätieto-osiossa. Mikäli lapselle halutaan hakea siirtoa toiseen ryhmään saman toimipisteen sisällä, otathan yhteyttä nykyisen toimipisteen johtajaan.

message.title: Application is urgent
message.text: If the need for an early childhood education place is due to sudden start of employment or studies, the place must be applied for at least two weeks before the need begins. The two-week processing time begins when proof of employment or studies has been submitted to Service Guidance (varhaiskasvatuksen.palveluohjaus@espoo.fi).

startDate.label: Desired start date
startDate.noteOnDelay: The application processing time is 4 months.

instructions.text: You can postpone your desired start date until the processing of your application starts. After this, you can make changes to your desired start date by contacting early childhood education service counselling (tel. 09 816 31000).
Indicate the most commonly needed early childhood education time, the time will be specified when early childhood education begins.

starts.label: Start time of daily early childhood education hours

ends.label: End time of daily early childhood education hours

instructions.text: Round-the-clock care refers to early childhood education needed on weekends or around the clock. Evening care is mainly early childhood education taking place outside the hours of 6:30 and 18:00 and on weekends. If you need evening or round-the-clock care, specify the need in the field for additional information.

message.title: Evening and round-the-clock care
message.text: Evening and round-the-clock care is intended for children whose both parents do shift work or study mainly in the evenings and/or on weekends. The application must be appended with both parents’ proof of shift work from the employer or studies that cause the need for evening and round-the-clock care.

clubCare.placeholder: Describe the need for support for the child.

instructions.text: The support need refers to such a need for support measures that has been indicated by an expert opinion. If the child has not previously attended the Espoo early childhood education services and their support need has been established, the Special Early Education Coordinator will contact you, if necessary, once you have indicated the support need on this application.

clubCare.label: The child needs support

text: The child has a sibling basis to the same early childhood education place attended by their sibling at the time of making the decision. All children living at the same address are considered to be siblings. The aim is to place siblings at the same early childhood education place, if the family so wishes. If you are applying for places for siblings who do not yet attend early childhood education, enter this piece of information in the additional information field.
Fill in this information only if you are applying the sibling basis.

select.label: I primarily apply for a place at the same early childhood education location attended by the child’s sibling.

input.label: First and last name of the sibling
input.ssn-label: Personal identity code of the sibling

select.title: Select a location and move it to the application preferences:
select.text: The list shows the available locations

text: You can apply for 1 to 3 locations in your order of preference. Application preferences do not guarantee a place at the desired location, but the possibility of obtaining a desired location increases by giving more than one option.
If you decided to apply the sibling basis in the previous field, indicate the early childhood education location in question as your first choice.

none-selected.title: No selected application preferences
none-selected.text: Add application preferences from the drop-down menu on the left.

units.selected-info: Select at least 1 and up to 3 locations and arrange them in your preferred order.

personalInfo.title: Personal information
personalInfo.text: The personal information has been retrieved from the population data services and cannot be changed with this application. If the personal information is incorrect, please update the information on the website of the Digital and Population Data Services Agency. If your address is about to change, you can add the new address in a separate field in the application. Add a future address for both the child and guardian. The address information will be official only when it has been updated to the database of the Digital and Population Data Services Agency. Decisions on the child's early childhood or pre-primary education place will be automatically sent to another guardian who lives at a different address based on the Population Information System.
personalInfo.guardian-required-details: The name and telephone number of the guardian are required. If possible, you can enter an email address.
personalInfo.otherPersonsInstructions: Income of a person living in the same household affects the early childhood education fees.
personalInfo.otherChildrenInstructions: Children living in the same household affect the early childhood education fees.

additional.title: Other additional information
additional.text-area: If you wish, you can provide more detailed information related to the application in this field.
additional.special-diet-placeholder: If you wish, you can indicate your child’s special diet in this field.
additional.special-diet-info: Some special diets require a separate medical certificate to be delivered to the early childhood education location. Exceptions are a low-lactose or lactose-free diet, a diet based on religious beliefs and vegetarian diet (lacto-ovo).
additional.allergies-placeholder: If you wish, you can indicate your child's allergies in this field.
additional.allergies-info: Information on allergies is mainly needed when applying for family day care.

payment.title: Early childhood education fee
payment.text:
The client fees for municipal early childhood education are calculated as a percentage of the family’s gross income. Depending on the family’s size and income and the hours of early childhood education, the fees vary from free early childhood education to a maximum monthly fee of EUR 288 per child. Each family must provide information about their gross income using the income statement form, no later than two weeks after their child’s early childhood education has started.

The income statement is not needed if the family agrees to pay the highest fee.
payment.text2:
You can find further information about early childhood education fees and the income statement form here:
Espoo.fi > Childcare and education > Early childhood education > Early childhood education fees
payment.checkbox: I give consent to the highest fee. This consent will remain valid until I state otherwise.

preschool-application.title: Enrolment for pre-primary education
text: Pre-primary education is attended one year before the start of compulsory education. Pre-primary education is free of charge. Enrolment for pre-primary education in the 2020–2021 school year takes place on 8–20 January 2020. Finnish pre-primary education begins on 13 August 2020 and Swedish pre-primary education on 18 August 2020. The decisions will be sent to the Suomi.fi Messages service or by post, if the applicant does not use the Suomi.fi Messages service.
* Information marked with a star is required

requestAnotherUnit.label: Lapseni on jo esiopetuksessa / varhaiskasvatuksessa ja haluan tehdä siirtohakemuksen toiseen toimipisteeseen.

instructions.text: Kun lapsella on jo paikka Espoon kunnallisessa varhaiskasvatuksessa ja lapselle halutaan hakea varhaiskasvatuspaikkaa toisesta toimipisteestä, tehdään siirtohakemus. Siirtohakemus on voimassa vuoden hakemuksen jättöpäivämäärästä. Sillä ei ole käsittelyaikaa vaan siirtopäätöksiä tehdään hakija- ja paikkatilanteen sen mahdollistaessa. Voit halutessasi antaa siirtoa koskien tietoa lisätieto-osiossa. Mikäli lapselle halutaan hakea siirtoa toiseen kerhoryhmään saman toimipisteen sisällä, otathan yhteyttä nykyisen toimipisteen johtajaan.

service.title: Service need

message.title: Hakemus on kiireellinen
message.text: Mikäli varhaiskasvatuksen tarpeen alkamisajankohtaa ei ole voitu ennakoida ja varhaiskasvatuspaikan tarve johtuu äkillisestä ja ennalta- arvaamattomasta työllistymisestä, opiskelusta tai koulutuksesta, tulee paikkaa hakea viimeistään kaksi viikkoa ennen kuin tarve alkaa. Kahden viikon käsittelyaika alkaa siitä, kun työ- tai opiskelutodistukset on toimitettu palveluohjaukseen (varhaiskasvatuksen.palveluohjaus@espoo.fi).

startDate.description:
Finnish pre-primary education begins on 13 August 2020 and Swedish pre-primary education on 18 August 2020.
If you need early childhood education starting from 1 August 2020 before the start of pre-primary education, you can apply for it with this application by selecting “I also apply for early childhood education related to pre-primary education”.
startDate.label: Start date in August

service.dailyTitle: Early childhood education need related to pre-primary education
dailyText: If necessary, you can apply for early childhood education related to pre-primary education for the child, which is subject to a charge and provided in addition to pre-primary education (4 h/day) in the mornings and/or afternoons in the same place as pre-primary education. If you wish early childhood education to start later than pre-primary education, enter the desired start date in the additional information field.

A separate written decision will be issued on the early childhood education place. The decision will be sent to the Suomi.fi Messages service or by post if you do not use the Suomi.fi messages service.

dailyTime.label: Daily early childhood education hours (including pre-primary education)

instructions.text: Pre-primary education is provided in both day-care centres and schools for 4 hours a day, as a rule, between 8:30 and 12:30, but the hours may vary by unit. Indicate the early childhood education hours needed by the child so that it includes the 4 hours of pre-primary education (e.g. 7:00–17:00). The hours will be specified when early childhood education begins. If the hours of early childhood education need to vary daily or weekly (e.g. in round-the-clock care), please specify the need in the additional information field.

connectedDaycare.label: I also apply for early childhood education related to pre-primary education.

instructions.text: There are four hours of free-of-charge pre-primary education provided a day. In addition to this, pre-primary education day-care centres and schools offer early childhood education in the morning before the start of pre-primary education and in the afternoon after pre-primary education. Early childhood education is subject to a charge.

Round-the-clock care refers to early childhood education needed on weekends or around the clock. Evening and round-the-clock care is mainly early childhood education taking place outside the weekday hours of 6:30 and 18:00.

message.title: Evening and round-the-clock care
message.text: Evening and round-the-clock care (early childhood education on weekends and around the clock) is intended for children whose guardians are both in shift work or study in the evening or during the weekends. In this case, the application should include proof of the need for evening or round-the-clock care due to the guardians’ work or studies. Proof is needed from both guardians. Please send these documents to: varhaiskasvatuksen.palveluohjaus@espoo.fi

clubCare.label: The child needs support
clubCare.placeholder: Describe the need for support for the child.

preparatory.label: The child needs support with learning Finnish. I am also applying for preparatory education. Not applicable for Swedish pre-primary education.

instructions.text: The preparatory education for children in the pre-primary education age is intended for children with an immigrant background, Finnish returnee children, children of bilingual families (excl. Finnish/Swedish) and adopted children who need support with the Finnish language before their transition to basic education. Preparatory education is provided, in addition to pre-primary education, on average for 1 hour per day. Education is free of charge.

preparatory.modalMessage: The locations that you have selected as application preferences, that do not provide preparatory education, will be removed from the application. Please verify the application preferences you have selected.

instructions.text: The support need refers to such a need for support measures that has been indicated by an expert opinion. If the child has not previously attended the Espoo early childhood education services and their support need has been established, the Special Early Education Coordinator will contact you, if necessary, once you have indicated the support need on this application.

preferredUnits.title: Application preference

text: A child enrolling for pre-primary education has a sibling-basis right to a

a)early childhood education in their own service area, where they have a sibling who has, at the moment of making the decision and in the coming pre-primary education year, a place at the pre-primary education day-care centre
b)local school determined by the city, which will be attended by their sibling in the coming school year.

If the child enrolling for pre-primary education has a sibling-basis right to both options, the guardian may decide which of them will be exercised. The selection is indicated by entering the name of the sibling in the field below.
Fill in this information only if you want to exercise the sibling-basis right.

select.label: I primarily apply for a place in the same location attended by the child’s sibling

text: You can apply for 1 to 3 locations in your order of preference. Application preferences do not guarantee a place at the desired location, but the possibility of obtaining a desired location increases by giving more than one option.
If you decided to exercise the sibling-basis right in the previous field, indicate the pre-primary education location in question as your first choice.

preferredUnits.outsourced-service-info: Private service providers and some outsourced services require a separate application for related early childhood education. Espoo Early Childhood Education is in contact with those affected.

additional.title: Other additional information
additional.text-area: If you wish, you can provide more detailed information related to the application in this field.
additional.special-diet-info: Some special diets require a separate medical certificate to be delivered to the pre-primary education and/or early childhood education location. Exceptions are a low-lactose or lactose-free diet, a diet based on religious beliefs and vegetarian diet (lacto-ovo).

care.title: Application preference
care.application-urgent-info:
Hakemus kunnalliseen varhaiskasvatukseen on jätettävä viimeistään neljä kuukautta ennen toivottua hoidon alkamispäivää.

Mikäli varhaiskasvatuksen alkamisajankohta ei ole ennakoitavissa ja varhaiskasvatuspaikan tarve johtuu äkillisestä työllistymisestä uuteen työpaikkaan tai äkillisestä uuden opiskelupaikan saamisesta, on varhaiskasvatuspaikkaa haettava niin pian kuin mahdollista, kuitenkin viimeistään kaksi viikkoa ennen kuin tarve alkaa. Tällöin on toimitettava hakemuksen liitteeksi todistukset äkillisestä työllistymisestä tai opiskelupaikan saamisesta.

Mikäli perhe kieltäytyy myönnetystä hoitopaikasta, tulee perheen jättää uusi hakemus. Tällöin noudatetaan yllä mainittua neljän kuukauden käsittelyaikaa uutta hoitopaikkaa järjestettäessä
care.start-date-info: Huomioittehan, että ennen varsinaisen hoidon aloittamista olisi hyvä, että lapsi yhdessä vanhemman kanssa tutustuisi tulevaan hoitopaikkaan. Tutustumisaikaa ei huomioida hoidon aloituspäivämäärässä. Tutustumisaika on myös maksuton. Tutustumisajan osalta tulee huomioida päiväkotien aukioloajat.
care.start-date-warning:
Valitsemasi päivämäärä {date} on alle 4 kuukauden päässä.

Hakemusten maksimi käsittelyaika on 4 kuukautta, riippuen hakemusten määrästä.
care.care-time-info:
Ilmoita ne kellonajat, jolloin lapsi yleisimmin tarvitsee hoitoa. Hoitopaikkaa hakiessa ei tarvitse ilmoittaa hoitoaikojen osalta yksittäisiä poikkeamia.

Varhaiskasvatusta tarjotaan päiväkodeissa ja ryhmäperhepäivähoidossa tarpeen mukaan klo 6.30 - 18.00 välisenä aikana.

Perhepäivähoidossa hoitajan työaika muotoutuu lasten hoitoaikojen perusteella. Päivittäinen toiminta-aika on pääsääntöisesti 8-9 tuntia. Hoitoajasta sovitaan tarkemmin ennen varhaiskasvatuksen alkamista.
care.weekly-care-total-info: Kunnallisen varhaiskasvatuksen asiakasmaksut määräytyvät prosenttiosuutena perheen bruttotuloista. Maksut vaihtelevat perheen koon ja tulojen sekä hoitoajan mukaan.
care.special-care-info: Varhaiskasvatuksen tavoitteena on lapsen tasapainoisen kasvun, kehityksen ja oppimisen edistäminen. Jos lapsesi tarvitsee tukea fyysisen, psyykkisen tai sosiaalisen kehityksensä vuoksi, mainitkaa se hakemuksessa. Mikäli sinulla on lapsen tuen tarpeesta lausunto, toimitathan lausunnon viimeistään kerhon alkaessa
care.shift-care-warning: Haettaessa ilta- tai vuorohoitoa (ympärivuorokautinen ja viikonloppuhoito), hakemuksen liitteeksi tulee toimittaa todistukset molempien vanhempien osalta ilta- tai vuorotyöstä tai iltaisin tapahtuvasta opiskelusta.
care.preschool-descr:
Lapsen on osallistuttava ennen oppivelvollisuuden alkamista vuoden kestävään esiopetukseen tai muuhun esiopetuksen tavoitteet saavuttavaan toimintaan. Lapsen tulee olla täyttänyt tai täyttää 6 vuotta sinä vuonna, kun esiopetukseen haetaan.

Esiopetusta tarjotaan sekä päiväkodeissa että kouluissa 4 tuntia päivässä kello 8-13 välisenä aikana.
care.preschool-datepicker-info: Lapsen asuinpaikan tai huoltajan työ- tai opiskelutilanteen muuttuessa taikka muusta vastaavasta erityisestä syystä esiopetukseen voi hakea hakuajan jälkeen.
care.preschool-toggle: Haen esiopetuspaikkaa toimintakauden jo alettua tai hakuajan umpeuduttua
care.club-care-date-info: Kerhot noudattavat varhaiskasvatuksen esiopetuksen työ- ja loma-aikoja. Kerhon toimintakausi on elokuusta toukokuun loppuun. Eri kerhot kokoontuvat eri viikonpäivinä.
care.club-2-year-old: 2-vuotta täyttäneelle, mutta alle 3-vuotiaalle lapselle on tarjolla kerhoitoa
care.club-not-old-enough: Kerhohoito on tarkoitettu 2-5-vuotiaille lapsille, lapsi voi aloittaa kerhohoidon täytettyään 2-vuotta.
care.was-on-daycare: Lapsi, jolle haetaan kerhopaikkaa, on varhaiskasvatuksessa ennen kerhon toivottua aloituspäivää.
care.was-on-daycare-info: Jos lapsi on ollut varhaiskasvatuksessa (päiväkodissa, perhepäivähoidossa tai ryhmäperhepäivähoidossa) ja luopuu paikastaan kerhon alkaessa, hänellä on suurempi mahdollisuus saada kerhopaikka
care.was-on-club-care: Lapsi on ollut kerhossa edellisen toimintakauden aikana.
care.was-on-club-care-info: Jos lapsi on ollut kerhossa jo edellisen toimintakauden aikana, on hänellä suurempi mahdollisuus saada paikka kerhosta

persons.title: Personal information
persons.info: Henkilötiedot on haettu Väestörekisterikeskukselta eikä niitä voi muuttaa. Jos henkilötiedoissa on virheitä, olkaa hyvä ja käykää päivittämässä tietonne maistraatin sivuilla. Jos osoitteenne on muuttunut tai muuttumassa, voitte lisätä sen hakemukselle erikseen. Virallisena osoitetietoa pidetään vasta, kun se on päivittynyt Väestörekisterikeskuksen tietoihin.
persons.new-addr-info: Espoo’s early childhood education considers the address retrieved from the Population Register Centre as the official address. The address in the Population Register Centre changes when the applicant makes a notification of move to Posti or the Local Register Office.
persons.new-addr: The address in the database of the Digital and Population Data Services Agency has changed/is about to change
persons.other-guardian-info: Yhteishuoltajuudessa lapsella on kaksi huoltajaa, jotka yleensä ovat lapsen äiti ja isä.

guardian2.title: Information of the other guardian
guardian2.other-vtj-guardian-exists-info: Other guardian information is automatically fetched from Population Register Center (VTJ)
guardian2.other-vtj-guardian-exists-different-addr: Other guardian information is automatically fetched from Population Register Center (VTJ). According to VTJ the other guardian lives in a different address. Guardians need to agree on applying to early education.
guardian2.other-vtj-guardian-does-not-exists-info: According to Population Register Center (VTJ) child does not have other guardian

agreement-status.title: Agreed with the other guardian
agreement-status.NOT_SET: Please select have you agreed with the other guardian
agreement-status.AGREED: We have agreed with the other guardian about this application
agreement-status.NOT_AGREED: We have not agreed with the other guardian about this application
agreement-status.RIGHT_TO_GET_NOTIFIED: The other guardian has only the right to get notified about the placement

guardian2.separate-address: Lapsen toinen huoltaja asuu eri taloudessa ja on tietoinen hakemuksesta.
guardian2.separate-address-daycare: The other guardian lives in a different household.
guardian2.separate-address-preschool: The other guardian lives in a different household.
guardian2.daycare-second-guardian-has-agreed-true: We have jointly agreed on the child’s application to early childhood education according to the information on the form
guardian2.preschool-second-guardian-has-agreed-tru: We have jointly agreed on the enrolment of the child to pre-primary education according to the information on the form.
guardian2.second-guardian-has-agreed-false: We have not been able to jointly agree on the enrolment/the other guardian only has the right to receive information.
guardian2.optional-second-guardian-information: If you wish, you can supplement the above information.
guardian2.second-guardian-has-agreed-section-valid: Toinen huoltaja asuu eri osoitteessa: alivastaus on pakollinen

other-adults.title: Spouse or cohabiting partner (not a guardian) living in the same household
other-adults.add-other-adult: The applicant has a spouse or a cohabiting partner who lives in the same household with the applicant and who is not the child’s guardian.
other-adults.add-other-adult-daycare: The applicant has a spouse or a cohabiting partner who lives in the same household with the applicant and who is not the child’s guardian.
other-adults.add-other-adult-info: The information of a partner who lives in the same household or a person who lives in a relationship comparable to marriage is needed because the person’s income affects the early childhood education fee even if the person is not the child’s guardian.

other-children-section.title: Other children
other-children-section.info: Perheen kokoon ja varhaiskasvatusmaksuun huomioidaan  yhteistaloudessa avioliitossa tai avioliitonomaisissa olosuhteissa elävät henkilöt sekä heidän kanssaan samassa taloudessa elävät molempien alaikäiset lapset.
other-children-section.label: Other children under 18 years of age living in the same household
other-children-section.label-daycare: Other children under 18 years of age living in the same household.

persons.other-children: Other children under 18 years of age living in the same household
persons.other-children-info: Perheen kokoon ja varhaiskasvatusmaksuun huomioidaan  yhteistaloudessa avioliitossa tai avioliitonomaisissa olosuhteissa elävät henkilöt sekä heidän kanssaan samassa taloudessa elävät molempien alaikäiset lapset.

child.title: Lapsen lisätiedot
child.allergies-info: Tavanomaiset allergiatiedot ovat tarpeelliset vain haettaessa perhepäivähoitoa; mikäli kyseessä on erittäin vaikea allergia, se käsitellään Lapsen tuen tarpeena.
child.diet-info: Osaan erityisruokavalioista tarvitaan erillinen todistus, joka pyydetään lapsen aloitettua hoidon.
child.assistance-info: Tehostetun ja tuen tarpeella tarkoitetaan sellaisten tukitoimien tarvetta, jotka on osoitettu asiantuntijalausunnoin. Tuen tarpeissa Espoon varhaiskasvatuksesta otetaan erikseen yhteyttä hakemuksen jättämisen jälkeen. Kehityksen ja oppimisen tuki varhaiskasvatuksessa toteutuu pääsääntöisesti lapsen kotia lähellä olevassa päiväkodissa tai perhepäivähoidossa. Tukitoimet toteutuvat lapsen arjessa osana varhaiskasvatuksen muuta toimintaa. Osa hoitopaikoista on varattu tukea tarvitseville lapsille.
child.assistance-placeholder: Describe the need for support of the child.

other.title: Other additional information
other.application-details-placeholder: Voit halutessasi antaa tarkempaa hakuun liittyvää tietoa tässä kentässä

summary.title: Yhteenveto
summary.daycare-title: Summary of application for early childhood education
summary.preschool-title: Summary of application for pre-primary education
summary.daycare-check-title: Check the application for early childhood education
summary.preschool-check-title: Check the application of enrolment for pre-primary education
summary.send-information: The application has not yet been sent. Please check the information you provided and send the application by clicking "Send the application" button in the end of the form.
summary.general-info: Cras erat lacus, facilisis sed orci non, lacinia condimentum libero. Aliquam lectus mi, convallis bibendum vestibulum at, gravida vitae elit. Ut at risus a sapien maximus cursus eget vitae dui. Suspendisse tempor, ligula vitae sollicitudin fringilla, neque ante ultrices erat, ut lacinia nisi velit in tellus.
summary.summary-checked: I have checked that the information in the application is correct

apply-section.sibling-basis: Haen ensisijaisesti paikkaa samasta kerhoryhmästä, jossa lapsen sisarus on.

persons-section.title: @:form.persons.title
persons-section.new-addr: The address in the Population Register Centre has changed/is about to change

confirmation.exit-form: Do you want to leave the page?

error-modal.unknown-error-text: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
error-modal.unauth-error-text: Click OK to identificate yourself again

validation.too-early-requested-start-date: Start date can not be earlier than the date on the decision
validation.too-late-requested-start-date: Start date can not be postponed to any date more than 14 days distant from the date on the decision.
validation.invalid-requested-start-date: Start date can not be postponed to any date more than 14 days distant from the date on the decision. Start date can not be earlier than the date on the decision.
